hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT user.id,user.name FROM User user WHERE user.deleted = 0
FROM User user WHERE user.id = :id AND user.deleted = 0
FROM User user WHERE user.loginName = :loginName AND user.password = :password AND user.deleted = 0

SELECT user.id, user.loginName,user.name, org.name, user.position,user.officeTel FROM User user LEFT JOIN user.organization org WHERE user.deleted = 0 AND user.id != 'u1' AND user.id != :userId order by user.registerDate desc

SELECT user.id, user.loginName,user.name, org.name, user.position,user.officeTel FROM User user LEFT JOIN user.organization org WHERE org.id = :nodeid AND user.id != 'u1' AND user.id != :userId AND user.deleted = 0 order by user.registerDate desc

SELECT user.id, user.loginName,user.name, org.name, user.position,user.officeTel FROM User user LEFT JOIN user.organization org WHERE user.deleted = 0 AND user.siteIds in (:siteIds) AND user.id != 'u1' AND user.id != :userId ORDER BY user.registerDate desc

SELECT user.id, user.loginName,user.name, org.name, user.position,user.officeTel FROM User user LEFT JOIN user.organization org WHERE org.id = :nodeid AND user.deleted = 0 AND user.siteIds in (:siteIds) AND user.id != 'u1' AND user.id != :userId order by user.registerDate desc
